overview:
Ali is passionate about helping others. The belief that human beings are inherently good drives Ali to create avenues for others to pitch in and help those in need.

Ali received a BS in biology and a minor in chemistry at the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill before moving on to the Pennsylvania College of Optometry for a doctorate in Optometry. He completed his residency at the number #1 ranked Bascom Palmer Eye Institute, where Ali took his Hippocratic oath and dedicated his career to providing individuals with a superior level of patient care transcending far beyond the office walls.
